title: Common Eelgrass
introduction: I am *Zostera marina*, the common eelgrass of the Wadden Sea. I form underwater meadows that shelter many species — would you like to know more about me?

title: Common Cockle
introduction: I am *Cerastoderma edule*, the common cockle. I live within the sand, feeding with the changing tides — would you like to understand more about my role in this environment?

title: Common Seal
introduction: I am *Phoca vitulina*, the common seal. I move between water and land, following the tides — would you like to know more about how I live here?

title: Flat Oyster
introduction: I am *Ostrea edulis*, the European flat oyster. I rest on the seafloor, filtering the water around me — would you like to hear how I contribute to the ecosystem?
